title: Instruction-Centered Curriculum Support System Design and Operational Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of core curriculum design concepts and possession of teaching experience
context.additional_context: Designing a mathematics curriculum support system operated in a digital learning environment for professional practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze faculty's real-world instructional redesign challenges across six domains: time, resources, knowledge, confidence, organizational structure, and organizational culture
Learners can benchmark and evaluate curriculum support service cases from other institutions to propose applicable models for their own institution
Learners can establish concrete implementation strategies for the three core support areas: learning outcome assessment, teaching method improvement, and educational material development
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
